name: unripened
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Unripened fruits or crops are not fully developed and ready to be eaten: There were crates of unripened tomatoes. Green beans are the unripened fruit pods of various species of beans.
Unripened cheese has not been left to develop its full flavour: This is a soft, unripened fresh cheese with a texture like yogurt. The whey is drained and the curds are pressed - this is fresh or unripened cheese. Related words
ripe
ripen
More examplesFewer examplesUnripened avocados will ripen if you put them into a bag with an apple. Olives, especially the unripened green ones, are usually very bitter. If the papaya aren't fully ripened, leave them in a brown bag along with some unripened kiwi fruit, peaches, and pears. This is a soft, unripened cheese made in France. These cheeses were known as green cheeses - "green" because of being unripened, unmatured.
